entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:17 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
